H0.text: Who was expelled from the Surrealist movement due to his views on the Spanish Civil War. André Breton

H1.text: Who was expelled from the Surrealist movement due to his views on the Spanish Civil War. Luis Buñuel

H2.text: Who was expelled from the Surrealist movement due to his views on the Spanish Civil War. Max Ernst

H3.text: Who was expelled from the Surrealist movement due to his views on the Spanish Civil War. Dalí

A4.text: Dalí was expelled from the Surrealist group after Franco's victory in 1939.

A5.text: In the May issue of the Surrealist magazine Minotaure, André Breton announced Dalí's expulsion from the Surrealist group.
